questions.author: Curio George
questions.notes: I'm a student at epicodus, and when programming it always seems as if I can just keep coding away deep into the night. Why does this occur when in so many other jobs and areas of study I find myself easily fatigued or distracted?

answers.author: Zoo Keeper
answers.content: Hi Curio, I think the reason is because programming is a passion of yours. Keep up the good work!
